shipping.title: Delivery throughout Armenia
shipping.content: We deliver in Yerevan through our couriers. Delivery to the regions is carried out by HayPost

support.title: Support 24/7
support.content: Contact us 24 hours a day, 7 days a week and our experts will help you choose the best

package.title: Beautiful packaging
package.content: Beautiful packaging and individual approach to each customer

quality.title: Guaranteed quality
quality.content: Our products are completely made of 925 sterling silver and are fully consistent with their description.
